participant_1.background:

my last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I've always dreamed of living in the desert.
I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

participant_2.background:
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
I will not talk about my favorite food with others.
While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I lie to my children about eating healthy.

content.text: Hi! I'm from a small town in the Midwest. I grew up running long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I grew up with older parents, so my music tastes are very different from theirs. I like to listen to contemporary and eclectic music. What about you?
I have a lot of different interests. I like to do stunts on my motorcycle, but I'm not very good at it yet. I also like to drink juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I've never been on a motorcycle! That sounds like fun. I like to eat healthy, but I don't always have the time to cook. My kids love junk food, so I'm always lying to them about what's good for them.
I can definitely relate to that! I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore. I have a hard time finding a job that fits my needs and skills.
What kind of work are you looking for? I've had a lot of different jobs, but I've finally found one that I really enjoy.
I'm not sure what I want to do yet. I'm just starting to explore my options.
That's great! It's never too late to start something new.
Thanks! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I'm sure you'll find something you love to do.
